data.enText: not lying down, and with the back straight rather than bent
He managed to pull himself upright.
Gradually raise your body into an upright position.
an upright freezer (= one that is taller than it is wide)
an upright chair (= one with a high straight back)
behaving in a moral and honest way

data.chText: 背部笔挺地坐 / 站；坐 / 站得笔直
data.enText: to sit or stand with your back straight

data.chText: （支撑用的）直柱，立柱，立放构件
data.enText: a long piece of wood, metal or plastic that is placed in a vertical position, especially in order to support sth

means: (支撑用的)直柱，立柱，立放构件

ex.chText: 那个图的纵轴代表什么？
ex.enText: What does the vertical axis of that graph represent?

ex.chText: 他们以前常去一个峭壁林立的峡谷。
ex.enText: They used to go to a gorge lined with vertical cliffs.

ex.chText: 滑雪中的“垂直落差”是什么意思？
ex.enText: What does 'vertical drop' mean in skiing?

synonyms.bx: 指与平面、水平线成 90 度角的，也可指沿此方向上升或下降的。

ex.chText: 一名服务生在他们餐桌旁笔直地站着。
ex.enText: A waiter stood erect beside their table.

synonyms.bx: 强调笔直挺拔的，而不是倾斜、弯曲或倒塌的。

ex.enText: He sat upright behind the desk.

ex.chText: 如果你非要带着这瓶颜料的话，你最让它保持直立。
ex.enText: If you have to carry this bottle of paint with you, then you'd better keep it upright.

synonyms.bx: 指站或坐得笔直的，也指处于竖直方向的。

data.chText: 背部笔挺地坐 / 站；坐 / 站得笔直
data.enText: to sit or stand with your back straight

tr: a piano with a vertical sounding board
a vertical structural member as a post or stake
example: the ball sailed between the uprights
for a dog, an erect tail indicates aggression
a column still vertical amid the ruins

value.def: If you are sitting or standing upright, you are sitting or standing with your back straight, rather than bending or lying down.

example.ex: Helen sat upright in her chair...
example.tran: 海伦笔直地坐在椅子上。

example.ex: ...those who had managed to remain upright...
example.tran: 那些尽力保持腰背挺直的人

example.ex: Jerrold pulled himself upright on the bed...
example.tran: 杰罗尔德从床上坐了起来。

example.ex: He moved into an upright position.

gramarinfo.label: usu ADJ after v, v-link ADJ, also ADJ n

value.tran: 垂直的；挺直的；直挺挺的

value.def: An upright vacuum cleaner or freezer is tall rather than wide.

example.tran: 最新款、最先进的立式吸尘器

value.tran: （吸尘器、冰箱等）竖式的，立式的

value.def: An upright chair has a straight back and no arms.

example.ex: He was sitting on an upright chair beside his bed, reading.
example.tran: 他正坐在床前一张直背椅上看书。

value.def: You can refer to vertical posts or the vertical parts of an object as uprights .
You can describe people as upright when they are careful to follow acceptable rules of behaviour and behave in a moral way.

example.tran: 一个非常正直可靠的人

trans: 挺身姿势；直立姿势；站立滑降姿势
